name: And Thou Shalt be a-Blessing..
description:
You are wandering the lands, searching for work. In a small village you start a small investigation into the case of an old woman, struggling with life.

Inspired by the Witcher universe and Diablo.

Byproduct of my blogging series on quest design.
This is an experiment! Don't judge it too hardly. Plays better in fullscreen.
